To compare the estimation of extremes as obtained from LENS with observations, we use Climate Prediction Center (CPC) unified gauge-based analysis of Daily Precipitation at the resolution of 0.25 degrees. Observed precipitation is first interpolated to match the resolution of CESM LENS outputs.
